ygData.subject: Re: Fear and level 16 spell questions
ygData.msgSnippet: What are you supposed to do to your charmed friends then? Kill them?
ygData.messageBody:
What are you supposed to do to your charmed friends then? Kill them?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nsane98@... [SMTP:Nsane98@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 1:12 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Fear and level 16 spell questions
>
> From: Nsane98@...
>
> cancel magic is an offensive spell, not defensive. So many people mistake
>
> the use of this spell. Imagine being in a duel with a cleric. I bet hes
> surprised when you cancel magic his +400 hp buffs away. same for npcs
> your
> fighitng, use cancel magic on the spells that are helping them. It's an
> offensive spell, and was designed that way.
>
> -Kanamar
>
